title: Duality of man
selftext:
People are suddenly experts on "truth" and "facts" when it affects them.

But resort to the same level as the ones they oppose on a some other topics.
ðŸ™‚ðŸ«
comments:
This looks pretty bad. And a person can look for information but he/she has to know what they are looking for. Same happened to me a couple of days ago, I found out about us retaking Goa from Portugese a couple of days ago, no one really talked about it, so I never knew that this happened in 1961 I thought this happened right after independence. 

Also does someone have a list of changes made prior to bjp government, I want to compare that with this, just to find out how out of the norm this is.

Yes I'm with you on this

But that's not the point of this post bruhhh

Please see the other screenshots
What there are other screenshots. Apologies.
